span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 无价值的人：a person of no importance or influence
【例】The intern is a mere cipher in the company. 这个实习生在公司里是个无足轻重的小人物。
【近】dwarf, half-pint, insect, insignificancy, lightweight, morsel, nonentity, nothing, nullity['nʌləti], snippersnapper, whippersnapper, zero
【反】big shot, big wheel, bigwig, eminence, figure, personage
【考法 2】 v. 计算（价值）：to determine (a value) by doing the necessary mathematical operations
【例】We were surprised by how much we had spent on the cruise after we had ciphered out the grand total. 当我们算出我们沉船游览的总花费时，我们都惊呆了。
【近】compute, work out
【考法 3】 n. 密码： a method of transforming a text in order to conceal its meaning
【例】convert their messages into cipher 把他们的信息转换成密码
【近】code, secret message
【记】 safer 更安全，需要加密;密码由一系列零和一组成
【另】 encipher 加密， decipher破译
